ingredients.ingredient: 3 Â½ cups smoked salmon, torn or cut into bite-sized pieces
3 tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice, or more to taste
freshly ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Pulse ingredients in food processor until smooth but still slightly textured
Use quality smoked salmon for best flavor in this simple preparation
Taste and adjust lemon juice gradually to balance the richness of creme fraiche
